body.head: The History of the Blessed Man Hor
body.p: Now in Mount Nitria there was a certain man whose name was Ho, concerning whom men, especially all the brotherhood, testify to many of his triumphs, and also that marvellous and excellent woman Melh√¢ (i.e., Melania), the handmaid of Christ, who went into this mountain before I did. As for me, I never became acquainted with this man. And in his history they say this one thing: He never told a lie in his life, and he never used oaths; he never uttered a curse, and beyond what was absolutely necessary he never spoke at all.
